availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hugh Knox Rachford (Campbell County, Kentucky, physician and delegate)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, physician and delegate. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Rachford. Father of Sameul Rachford, Benjamin Knox Rachford, Eliza K. Rachford, Clarence Rachford, and Robert Y. Rachford. Delegate to the Kentucky State Democratic Party Convention from Campbell County in 1860. Physician in Campbell County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Campbell County, p. 182; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Campbell County, Alexandria, p. 6; "Democratic Meeting in Campbell," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), October 27, 1859, p. 1.
